author: Kim Hagey
content: excellent guide .. worked without a hitch so far ..now i want to give access to a NAS server , a wd booklive so that i can share files with a friend but for the life of me i can't figure out how to do it .. I set up the dns server on mybook with both my homw server and my ddns server from dlink, but can't access it from outside my network .. i know i need ports set up or port forarding  or something but can't find info on how to do it .. help please
